application.name: mocgap
application.brief: Fix data gap in MOC images
application.description: Fixes data gaps in MOC images that occur around detector 371. The program calculates the average and standard deviation of the 5 pixels on a line centered at detector 371 and

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: This is the input cube to be procesed and fixed around detector 371. must be an Isis cube from the Mars Global Surveyor Orbital Camera, and it needs to have already been processed to a level 1 cube.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: This is the cube to which we will output our data

parameter.name: MAXSD
parameter.description: This parameter describes how many standard deviations from the local average are considered valid for the purpose of filling in the gap.
